shortExplanation.shortExplanation: A new generation of enterprise mobility allows you to make your deskless workers more productive and engaged. See measurable results in only 12 weeks.

content.value: Businesses that rely on traditional enterprise software risk alienating the 80% of the workforce that don’t have desk jobs.
There are 2.7 billion employees worldwide who don’t sit behind a desk. When it comes to implementing hardware and software to accommodate their needs, employers have lagged behind.

A mobile workforce demands a mobile solution. Here’s everything you need to know to create an app strategy that will make workers feel more valued and  
more productive.

contentfulServices.formularForSuccessHeading: How to succeed with Enterprise Mobility

content.value:
Imagine the impact on productivity if the deskless 80% also had access to powerful software tools to help them work. These employees are the unsung heroes who could serve your customers better if they had the mobile tools they really need. This could lead to better productivity and profitability.
It’s not like we’re being held back by hardware - today’s mobile devices have the same amount of computing power as the latest desktops and are ready to be unleashed on the most demanding of jobs.

Enterprise mobility is designed for an entirely new group of users and devices, which is why it requires a new approach. The kind of user experience we take for granted at home is only just beginning to be introduced into our workplaces. An approach that focuses on productivity tools and software designed for stationary machines and stationary people is being replaced by one that understands the transformative opportunities that Enterprise Mobility brings.
Imagine a mobile app custom built for your workforce that :
Gathers data that you can use to improve your processes
Is ready in a fraction of the time your traditional projects are completed
